newsitem.title: JAPAN: Russian platinum shipment arrives in Japan--trader.
newsitem.headline: Russian platinum shipment arrives in Japan--trader.

text.p: Russia's first platinum shipment following a six-month suspension arrived at Tokyo's Narita airport late on Thursday, a senior official of a large Japanese bullion house said on Friday.

"The first shipment of Russian platinum arrived in Tokyo yesterday, and if they can keep delivering platinum for at least the next three months, supply concerns in the Japanese market will be erased," the official said.
He did not specify the size of the shipment. He said a second platinum shipment, for a foreign bullion house, would probably arrive in Tokyo this weekend.
World platinum and palladium prices have soared since the beginning of this year due to the suspension of supplies by the Russian platinum group metal export agency, Almazjuvelirexport.
